tags: None
review:
Well experienced,dedicated, soft spoken doctor i have met ever.
I have met him for arthoscopic surgery on my knee by last month.
He had explained me the issues and and surgery details patiently, gave a good treatment and post surgery recovery support.
I will suggest doctor to my friends and others, if any requirements for ortho medicines and surgery.

tags: None
review: Excellent Doctor and great Surgeon. He explained the problem and even the surgery procedure in detail without creating any panic. Has taken extremely good care during surgery and subsequent visits post that. Appreciate his patience in responding to all our questions every time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He had treated and carried out knee surgery for a sports related injury on my son few years back so we are familiar with the doctor and pleased with his friendliness and his memory to recollect my son's surgery under trying circumstances during the Chennai floods in 2015 ; he even enquired about him and his welfare !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: He is very experienced and really confident and soft nature in explaining the problem and solution. Visited twice in last one year and very much satisfied with his approach. I hope he is the chief in Astra for ortho even other ortho specialists in Astra take advice from Dr.Clement. *** ** *** **** ** *** ****** *******

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: The Dr explained patiently to all the queries raised which will enable the confidence of the patient which is the foremost thing in providing treatment. Further the Dr is so friendly which will enable the patient to reveal the illnesses and also helping to build up confidence on the treatment given at the Centre.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Hello Doctor,
Myself Syed Althaf Hussain A.
Thank you for the most wonderful treatment for my mom she is undergone HTO surgery & Meniscus Repair on her Left Knee. (March 27-2022)  The brilliant treatment deserves immense thanks and appreciation. Sending over our most humble and heartfelt thanks for your immense care and comfort during the treatment.
I recommend the doctor
Well, experienced, dedicated, soft-spoken doctor I have met ever.
I will suggest the doctor to my friends and others if any requirements for ortho medicines and surgery. 
- Syed Althaf Hussain A
  from Panruti.

review: Succinct explanation of my problem with model was given. Thish made me understand in simple language my problem and its remedy. Also the doctor was very relaxed and did not allow me to panic which built tremendous confidence in the treatment suggested. Overall very satisfied with the experience.

review:
Frankly, I am yet to come across a Doctor like Dr. Clement Joseph.
Extraordinary. We are totally satisfied with him.
I will not have any hesitation in recommending him to anybody whoever I come across with orthopedic problems.
Our personal regards & thanks to him.
